titleInfo.title: Invitation to the Dedication of Nolan

mods.abstract: The invitations to the dedication of the Nolan Engineering Center were in the form of mini-blueprints, showing the new building in relation to the Thomas Center, Library, the equally new Buckman Quad, and the Tennis Courts (later replaced by faculty/staff parking). To draw attention to them, the invitations were sent in mailing tubes instead of envelopes.
mods.accessCondition: While CBU may house an item, it does not necessarily hold the copyright on the item, nor may it be able to determine if the item is still protected under copyright law. For all requests, please contact the Archives at archives@cbu.edu.
